QuestData.Title: To Wyrmrest!
QuestData.Description: The Dragon Soul... a weapon with enough power to defeat Deathwing. Thanks to you, it is now safely in our hands.$b$bCome! The aspects await us. We must bring the Dragon Soul to Wyrmrest Temple, in the center of Dragonblight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Thrall safely to Wyrmrest Temple.
